info.name: Group Page Fix
info.description: Currently the BLOXCity Group page is broken. Until g0dfrey (ceo of bloxcity) fixes this. This theme will be  a decent subtitute. Once the bloxcity group page is updated I will take down this style.
info.additionalInfo: Do not use this style, the group page has been fixed. Source for this can be found here (If your interested): http://pastebin.com/NEpSmpRz Version:1.00 Update Log 7/21/2016-Release of style Bugs I am aware of The username of people aren't under their profile image.
